ing: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans frozen limeade concentrate
des: "This is a very simple drink to make. It is easier than ever. Everyone I introduce this to wants more, more, MORE!"
ins: Empty the limeade into a 2 quart pitcher. Using the empty limeade cans, fill each one twice with citrus soda and pour into the pitcher. Fill one limeade can with tequila and pour into the pitcher. Adjust alcohol to personal taste. Mix well and serve.
